metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25513 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where an attacker may cause an out-of-bounds read by tricking a user into running cuobjdump on a malformed input file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to limited denial of service, code execution, and limited information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
